metadata.title: Manasseh Changachirere
metadata.description: I’m a software engineer and founder. I founded Nextsoft in 2025, currently working on it, building the next generation of software and infrastructure for Zimbabwe & Africa.

description.0: I’m a software engineer and founder of <url1><serif>Nextsoft</serif></url1> & <url2><serif>Piro LLC</serif></url2>. My stack revolves heavily around <serif>TypeScript</serif>. I'm currently building <url1><serif>Teleagents</serif></url1> bringing enterprise voice agents to Zimbabwe and Africa.
description.1: I believe the best products are built at the <serif>intersection of art and technology</serif>. That is what I strive for in everything I engage in. I pursue <serif>perfection</serif> knowing full well it is unattainable — but in the process, <serif>excellence</serif> is achieved.
description.2: Outside of shipping code, I study Christian theology and world history, I enjoy morning runs, and learning to play the <url4><serif>piano</serif></url4>.

error404.title: Page Not Found
